SELECT SUM(C.total) AS groupEnergy, SUM(CASE WHEN C.energyType IN ('produceHeat', 'forHeat') THEN C.total ELSE 0 END ) AS hotEnergy, SUM(CASE WHEN C.energyType IN ('powerElectric','lightElectric') THEN C.total ELSE 0 END ) AS electricEnergy, SUM(CASE C.energyType WHEN 'repairWater' THEN C.total ELSE 0 END ) AS waterEnergy, SUM(CASE C.energyType WHEN 'gas' THEN C.total ELSE 0 END ) AS gasEnergy, SUM(CASE C.energyType WHEN 'coal' THEN C.total ELSE 0 END ) AS coalEnergy, C.yeardate, (CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(C.yeardate, '%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y') THEN '1' ELSE '0' END ) curyear FROM (SELECT MAX(B.dosage) AS total, B.yeardate AS yeardate, B.energyType AS energyType FROM(SELECT A.*, IF(A.orgtype = '1',(SELECT f.HEAT_TYPE FROM t_emc_unit_feed f WHERE f.id = A.unitid),'') AS heat_type FROM(SELECT h.COMID AS comid, h.UNITID AS unitid, etype.NAME_EN AS energyType, h.DOSAGE AS dosage, DATE_FORMAT(h.DOSAGE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d') AS yeardate, v.type AS orgtype FROM (t_emc_final_data_hour h LEFT JOIN t_emc_energy_type etype ON h.TYPEID = etype.id) LEFT JOIN v_emc_unit_feed v ON h.COMID = v.COM_ID ) A ) B WHERE 1 = 1
AND (DATE_FORMAT(B.yeardate, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #{toolStartDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (DATE_FORMAT(B.yeardate, '%Y-%m-%d') >= SUBDATE(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 5 DAY)
AND DATE_FORMAT(B.yeardate, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #{toolEndDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
AND DATE_FORMAT(B.yeardate, '%Y-%m-%d') <= CURDATE())
OR (DATE_FORMAT(B.yeardate, '%Y-%m-%d') >= SUBDATE(#{toolStartDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
OR (DATE_FORMAT(B.yeardate, '%Y-%m-%d') >= SUBDATE(SUBDATE(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 5 DAY), INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
AND DATE_FORMAT(B.yeardate, '%Y-%m-%d') <= SUBDATE(#{toolEndDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTERVAL 1 YEAR))
AND DATE_FORMAT(B.yeardate, '%Y-%m-%d') <= SUBDATE(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
AND B.heat_type = #{toolFeedType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.comid = (select com_id from t_emc_org where id=#{toolOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) GROUP BY B.yeardate, B.energyType ) C GROUP BY C.yeardate ORDER BY C.yearDate ASC
